languages.text: "Как прикажете, Госпо{mf|дин|жа}. Простите нас... мы лишь хотели вас порадовать и воспроизвести инопланетное чудо, о котором вычитали в старинной хронике..."
"As you command, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. Forgive us... We wished only to delight you by reproducing an otherworldly miracle we had read about in an ancient chronicle..."
languages.original_text: "Как прикажете, Госпо{mf|дин|жа}. Простите нас... мы лишь хотели вас порадовать и воспроизвести инопланетное чудо, о котором вычитали в старинной хронике..."

traits.locale_text: "As you command, Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. Forgive us... We only wanted to delight you and reproduce an alien miracle we had read about in an ancient chronicle…"
"As you command, Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. Forgive us... We only wanted to delight you and reproduce an alien miracle we had read about in an ancient chronicle…"
"As you command, Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. Forgive us... We wished only to delight you by reproducing an alien miracle we had read about in an ancient chronicle…"
"As you command, Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. Forgive us... We wished only to delight you by reproducing an alien miracle we had read about in an ancient chronicle…"
"As you command, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. Forgive us... We wished only to delight you by reproducing an otherworldly miracle we had read about in an ancient chronicle..."
"As you command, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. Forgive us... We wished only to delight you by reproducing an otherworldly miracle we had read about in an ancient chronicle..."

languages.text: “如您所愿，来自上界的大人。请您原谅我们……我们仅仅是想重现我们在远古史书上读到的奇迹造物，以此来取悦您……”
languages.original_text: "As you command, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. Forgive us... We wished only to delight you by reproducing an otherworldly miracle we had read about in an ancient chronicle..."

traits.locale_text: “如您所愿，来自上界的大人。请您原谅我们……我们仅仅是想重现我们在远古史书上读到的奇迹造物，以此来取悦您……”

languages.text: 「天の{mf|君|姫}の仰せのままに。どうかお許しください…私たちはただ、古の年代記で読んだ異世界の奇跡を再現し、あなたを喜ばせたかっただけなのです…」
languages.original_text: "As you command, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. Forgive us... We wished only to delight you by reproducing an otherworldly miracle we had read about in an ancient chronicle..."

traits.locale_text: 「天の{mf|君|姫}の仰せのままに。どうかお許しください…私たちはただ、古の年代記で読んだ異世界の奇跡を再現し、あなたを喜ばせたかっただけなのです…」

languages.text: «Como ordene, mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial. Perdónenos... tan solo pretendíamos deleitarle recreando un milagro sobre el cual habíamos leído en una antigua crónica...».
languages.original_text: "As you command, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. Forgive us... We wished only to delight you by reproducing an otherworldly miracle we had read about in an ancient chronicle..."

traits.locale_text: «Como ordene, mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial. Perdónenos... tan solo pretendíamos deleitarle recreando un milagro sobre el cual habíamos leído en una antigua crónica...».

languages.text: "Emriniz başımız üstüne Semavi {mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz}. Af buyurun... Yalnızca kadim bir vakayinamede okuduğumuz uhrevi bir mucizeyi taklit ederek sizi memnun etmek istemiştik."
languages.original_text: "As you command, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. Forgive us... We wished only to delight you by reproducing an otherworldly miracle we had read about in an ancient chronicle..."

traits.locale_text: "Emriniz başımız üstüne Semavi {mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz}. Af buyurun... Yalnızca kadim bir vakayinamede okuduğumuz uhrevi bir mucizeyi taklit ederek sizi memnun etmek istemiştik."

languages.text: « À vos ordres, Votre Céleste Seigneurie. Pardonnez-nous... Nous voulions uniquement vous divertir en reproduisant un miracle surnaturel dont nous avons découvert l'existence dans une ancienne chronique... »
languages.original_text: "As you command, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. Forgive us... We wished only to delight you by reproducing an otherworldly miracle we had read about in an ancient chronicle..."

traits.locale_text: « À vos ordres, Votre Céleste Seigneurie. Pardonnez-nous... Nous voulions uniquement vous divertir en reproduisant un miracle surnaturel dont nous avons découvert l'existence dans une ancienne chronique... »

languages.text: "Wie Ihr befehlt, {mf|himmlischer Herr|himmlische Herrin}. "Vergebt uns ... Wir wollten Euch nur erfreuen, indem wir ein andersweltliches Mirakel reproduzierten, von dem wir in einer alten Chronik gelesen hatten ..."
languages.original_text: "As you command, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. Forgive us... We wished only to delight you by reproducing an otherworldly miracle we had read about in an ancient chronicle..."

traits.locale_text: "Wie Ihr befehlt, {mf|himmlischer Herr|himmlische Herrin}. "Vergebt uns ... Wir wollten Euch nur erfreuen, indem wir ein andersweltliches Mirakel reproduzierten, von dem wir in einer alten Chronik gelesen hatten ..."
